notes: Complete implementation of all features specified in input_ui_spec.txt. The project includes: 1) All 6 required pages (Home, About, Initiatives, Articles, Get Involved, Contact) plus article detail page. 2) Full form validation for volunteer sign-up and contact forms. 3) Category filtering on initiatives page. 4) Responsive design using Tailwind CSS breakpoints. 5) Accessible components with ARIA labels and semantic HTML. 6) Strict TypeScript configuration with no usage of 'any'. 7) Mock data for initiatives and articles. 8) React Router for client-side navigation. 9) Lazy loading for performance optimization. 10) Custom eco-friendly color palette. The project is production-ready and follows all technical requirements including React 18, TypeScript strict mode, Vite build tool, Tailwind CSS, and pnpm package manager.
